memberdef.name: ScaleCoefficients

memberdef.name: CropCoefficients

briefdescription.para: Set all but the greatest n coefficient to zero in the defined grid size.

memberdef.name: CropCoefficients

briefdescription.para: Set all coefficient with an absolute value smaller then "minAbsoluteValue" to zero (deadzone)
